results.name: Marenian Tavern Story: Patty and the Hungry God

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and up
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: *This app features partial controller support with the Xbox One controller. The UI guides on the screen are set to keyboard controls as default, but will be switched to the Xbox One buttons if the game recognizes controller input. Depending on the system the app might rarely show a black screen while loading. If performance drops, please restart the game once after saving and select Continue from the title screen.
